h1.span: Updated Information/Food Program During School Closure

span.span: The Strafford R-VI School District is offering breakfast and lunch meals for all of our students. The details to our program are listed below. We are changing to ONLY ONE pick-up time each week beginning Monday, April 13. This will help decrease potential exposure for our staff and our parents picking up food. You do not need to sign-up if you are picking up

span.br: We are distributing the meals in bags that include 5 breakfasts and 5 lunches.

span.span: When do I pick-up the meals?
span.br: There will be only ONE pick-up time on Mondays from 5:00-7:00pm. There is an option for delivery. If you are in need of delivery, please contact Marcy Easterly at marcye@straffordschools.net to have that set up. If you're picking up meals, no sign-ups are needed.

span.span: Where do I pick-up the meals?
span.br: All food will be picked up from our high school cafeteria, located on the north side of the building. When you arrive to pick-up your food, you will provide your name and the student names. We will bring the food to your car, you will not enter the building.

span.span: Thank you for your cooperation and please stay safe, healthy, and follow the advice of the CDC during this situation.
